pages.title: Somnium Infuser
pages.text: The Somnium Infuser is similar to a brewing stand in that it produces potions. It infuses Somnium into mixtures that can be used for gaining the ability to regen Somnium, to increase that ability, to brew a potion that makes your channeling of Somnium much more effecient, you can even infuse Somnium into a brew to be immune from fear for a period of time.
Who knows what other potions can be infused with Somnium for an incredibly powerful result...
To build a somnium infuser you need Test Tube and Test Tube Head
pages.name: Somnium Infuser

pages.text: If you have both materials you can now build a somnium infuser!
